title.rendered: Lash Extensions: A Natural-Looking Beauty Enhancement

content.rendered:
Today, women around the world are enjoying the perfect lashes that they always dreamed of having but could never quite experience until now. For many of these women, eyelash extensions have provided a new way to set aside mascara, eyelash curlers, and all the other makeup tools that were once the go-to option for achieving perfectly-curled and full lashes. Despite their increased popularity, however, lash extensions remain a source of myth and wonder for some women. One of the most common myths is that eyelash extensions will look unnatural and fake – like false eyelashes often do. The fact is, though, that nothing could be further from the truth!

Makeup vs Lash Extensions: Is There a Natural Winner?

The problem with that myth is that it has no basis in fact. To the contrary, women who choose eyelash extensions over their old mascara makeup routine quickly realize just how much more natural their lashes can look. Consider the facts:

  • With mascara, your lash look can vary from day to day, depending upon how you apply it. Those alterations in appearance are anything but natural, especially when the mascara runs, clumps, or otherwise refuses to cooperate.
  • Eyelash extensions will look the same, day after day – in much the same way that your natural lashes remain constant when you’re not wearing mascara. That’s a natural look.

False Lashes vs Lash Extensions: Which is More Natural?

Unfortunately, some women continue to believe that lash extensions are like false eyelashes – a belief that explains why they’re skeptical about this beauty enhancement. Unlike false lashes, though, eyelash extensions are not a beauty enhancement that you put on and take off as the mood strikes you. Each extension is carefully glued to an individual lash – which is why they don’t all come lose. False lashes are notorious for coming lose at the most inopportune times!

The Magic of Lash Extensions

There is one inescapable truth about eyelash extensions: they are one of the best ways to achieve that full lash look without looking unnatural. Best of all, you can get that look without spending an hour a day applying and removing makeup. You can also take that look anywhere you go, without worrying about mascara streaks, dislodged falsies, and other beauty enhancement nightmares. Most important, you get to have perfect lashes that look full, lush, elegantly curled – and totally natural. Chances are that only your closest friends and family will ever guess that you’ve made a change!

At Ebenezer Eyelash, we understand how important it is for today’s women to maintain that natural beauty. Sure, you want to look dynamic and drop-dead gorgeous, but you want to do that in a way that fits within your natural beauty style. Our technicians are skilled at helping you create the perfect look for your lashes so that you can enjoy that natural appearance in an even more dynamic way. To learn more about the best lash extensions in New York City, call to schedule your appointment today.
